name: The DREICH Deathmatch Levels
description: Levels 1 to 8 for Deathmatch , note that level 2 is just a re done version of Paul Tompkins unreal.wad . The rest I made myself . Play with monsters , altdeath and respawn settings . I am contactable on Blade , Flashpoint , City , Potato Paradise , and Nightriders if anyone wants a game .( This may not be important but I will not be in the country between 12th Dec '94 and 10th Jan '95 but will return after that date )
